2.5. Logging to CloudWatch¶

F5 Virtual Editions support comprehensive request and security logging for compliance and troubleshooting using two AWS native features: S3 buckest and CloudWatch. In this lab we’ll configure logging to CloudWatch.

  • 2.5.1. LTM Request Logging to CloudWatch
  • 2.5.2. WAF HTTP Request and Security Logging to CloudWatch
